name: Grappy
description:
Join robot adventurer In-D in a perilous escape from a cave. Utilize his extendable hands to zip and rotate around the crevices of the cave walls!

Use Left Click to Grapple towards rocks

Use Right Click to Rotate around rocks

Use the A and D arrow keys to Move

Use Spacebar to Jump

Press S while mid-air to Fall Faster

Developers:

  • Gregorio Lozada (Artist/Programmer): https://twitter.com/Grego_261
  • Brian Withrow(Sound Composer/Programmer): https://twitter.com/AlasPoorJoker
